project.name: University of Azores
project.presentation: Responsible for the development and maitainance of the web publication of the University.
project.description:
This is by far the most complex and challenging project but I have been involved.

It started back in 2002 with a development of a simple website and ended up with a complex system that supports the entire web publication of the Uiveristy.

At the moment, most of development is in Symfony 1.4. A content managmente system was development taking into consideration the necessities of the University.

All web servers run Linux and integrate external services through web services calls.

A symfony admin theme was realesed open source.

A few of the services that are integrated: Google Apps Education, Microsft Active Directory and Oracle Databases.

Some of the php applications in use: WordPress, Moodle and Mahara.
project.keywords: frontend and backend development, maintainance, migration, services integration, linux server administration
